title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; chat, stream, embeddings, model ops.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package integrating Ollama as a LLM provider inside LangChain.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (formerly Ollama-WebUI): themes, folders, share chats, admin panel.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models, history, syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & PVC support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java SDK for Ollama: synchronous & async APIs, streaming, model management.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama: generate, chat, embeddings, model ops in idiomatic Ruby.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators & embedders in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: function-calling, vision, fine-tune, LangGraph, Autogen, streaming UI.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Minimal Tauri desktop app for Ollama: lightweight, cross-platform, tray icon, auto-updater.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to spin up Ollama services in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake providing Ollama binaries, modules & overlay for declarative macOS/NixOS deployments.

title: ollama-swift
summary: Swift Package Manager client for Ollama; integrate local LLMs into macOS/iOS apps.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for local AI assistance: summarize notes, brainstorm, Q&A with Ollama.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command for chatting with local models in channels/DMs.

title: ollama-ktor
summary: Kotlin Ktor client & server integration for Ollama; coroutines, streaming, content-negotiation.
